item.title: Stereo to 5.1 Audio - Upwork
item.description:
Hey there! Quick job for yall'

I have a 30second clip with a stereo clip made. Wanting to convert it to a 5.1 file to account for camera movement. Nothing too crazy. Thanks!!


Files here. Including actual video. 320kbps full audio and wet stems.

https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1G_72utCCqsPRUS75oyXkmQVyLCiLTAVS

Hourly Range: $20.00-$70.00
Posted On: June 20, 2024 01:35 UTC
Category: Audio Production
Skills:Audio Editing, Sound Mixing, Audio Production
Skills: Audio Editing, Sound Mixing, Audio Production
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States
click to apply
